Patient 22: Patient 22 is a 70-year-old male with a complex medical history including chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), heart failure, and chronic kidney disease stage 3. He is currently on a regimen that includes furosemide, spironolactone, and tiotropium. His medication management is complicated by a history of non-compliance and frequent hospitalizations. There is no documented family history or known allergies.
